title: The Sims 4: Deluxe Edition – v1.84.197.1030 + All Add-ons + Online
body:
The Sims 4: Deluxe Edition – v1.84.197.1030 + All Add-ons + Online


Genres/Tags: Artificial life, Managerial, God sim, 3D
Companies: Maxis / Electronic Arts
Languages: RUS/ENG/MULTI18
Original Size: 53.6 GB
Repack Size: 30 GB

 

Download Mirrors

  • 1337x | [magnet] [.torrent file only]
  • RuTor [magnet]
  • Tapochek.net
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) [Use JDownloader2]
  • Filehoster: ZippyShare
  • Filehoster: BayFiles
  • Filehoster: OneDrive (Uploaded by DyR0 t(-_-t), NOT compatible with other mirrors)
  • Filehosters: Google Drive, OneDrive + others (Uploaded by crackhub213)
  • 1337x | KAT – [magnet] [.torrent file only]
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) [Use JDownloader2]
  • Filehoster: Google Drive (Uploaded by hermietkreeft)
  • Filehosters: Google Drive + many others (Uploaded by LaRoyal, NOT compatible with other mirrors)

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • WARNING! Starting with version v1.69.57.1020 my repacks of The Sims 4 do not contain unnecessary Legacy Edition (x86) files – official support for LE has ended in 2019 and none of those new expansions/DLCs work in LE since. If you’re still in 0.5% group of Windows x86 users, you may download some older repack and play Legacy version of the game
  • Based on The.Sims.4.My.Wedding.Stories-CODEX ISO release: codex-the.sims.4.my.wedding.stories.iso (57,220,104,192 bytes)
  • Missing languages and alternative Anadius crack (with online support) added (311 MB), thanks to anadius!
  • Game version: v1.84.197.1030; all DLCs and addons are included and activated
  • Mod-fix for latest DLC is available in “_Fix” folder after installation, click on “readme.url” for instructions
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files of x64 version are identical to originals after installation
  • All DLCs, add-ons & bonus soundtrack included
  • Unsupported x86 Legacy version ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • No Origin installation required for running
  • All 18 languages available
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from cumulative 53.6 to 30 GB)
  • Installation takes: ~9 minutes on 16-threads CPU; ~15 minutes on 8-threads CPU; ~30 minutes on 4-threads CPU
  • HDD space after installation: 49.8 GB
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • Use “language-changer.exe” in game root to change the game language, thanks to anadius!
  • Use “dlc-toggler.exe” and “dlc-uninstaller.exe” in game root to enable/disable/uninstall DLCs you don’t need, thanks to anadius!
  • If you don’t have DLCs or the game closes with Origin error: close “Origin”, allow the game EXEs access to Internet and run it as admin
  • Repack uses XTool library by Razor12911
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack

For newer DLCs to work run the game as admin.

Game Description

The Sims 4 is the highly anticipated life simulation game that lets you play with life like never before. Control smarter Sims with unique appearances, personalities, behaviors, and emotions. Experience new levels of creativity when you sculpt Sims with the powerful Create A Sim and design beautiful homes with tactile, room-based Build Mode. Use The Gallery to browse, share, and download new content without ever leaving your game. Control the mind, body, and heart of your Sims and explore your new gameplay possibilities in vibrant neighborhoods that bring your stories to life.
  • The Sims 4, updated to v1.84.197.1030 (x64)
